title: programming with SQL
description: We zoeken een consultant voor een programmeerproject waarbij je een sleutelrol speelt in het opzetten, verbeteren en onderhouden van datagedreven oplossingen. Je werkt nauw samen met ons team om eisen te vertalen naar duidelijke technische stappen. Je bouwt SQL-queries, optimaliseert bestaande scripts en ondersteunt bij het ontwerpen van datamodellen. Je zorgt voor heldere documentatie en geeft praktisch advies over verbeteringen. Ervaring met databases, gestructureerd werken en zelfstandig problemen oplossen is belangrijk.

title: Operations
description: We are looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Operations Specialist to support and optimize daily business activities. In this role, you will coordinate processes, improve workflows, and ensure smooth operational performance across departments. You will play a key part in maintaining efficiency, quality, and consistency in our day-to-day operations.

title: Project Manager
description: Als Project Manager neem jij de leiding over diverse projecten van initiatie tot oplevering. Je bewaakt planning, budget en kwaliteit, en zorgt dat alle betrokken stakeholders soepel samenwerken. Je bent de drijvende kracht achter een gestructureerde aanpak en weet complexe uitdagingen om te zetten in overzichtelijke stappen en haalbare doelen.

title: Project Lead

title: Risk & Compliance Analyst
description: You support clients by developing dashboards, mapping risks and reviewing internal controls. You also help set up monitoring routines and document compliance findings so that organisations can respond quickly to emerging issues.

description: You support clients by developing dashboards, mapping risks and reviewing internal controls. You also help set up monitoring routines and document compliance findings so that organisations can respond quickly to emerging issues.

title: HR Expert

The ideal candidate has a strong understanding of HR best practices, exceptional interpersonal skills, and the ability to drive a positive and productive workplace culture.

title: Accounting consultant

The ideal candidate will bring deep technical knowledge, strong analytical skills, and the ability to work independently while supporting strategic business decisions.

title: Healthcare Consultant
description:
We are seeking an experienced Healthcare Consultant to join our network of professionals and support healthcare organizations in optimizing processes, improving patient outcomes, and delivering strategic solutions.
As a consultant, you will work closely with hospitals, clinics, and healthcare service providers to identify challenges, implement improvements, and guide transformation initiatives.

title: Data Analyst Consultant
description: We are looking for a Data Analyst Consultant to support our clients with data-driven insights, reporting and decision-making. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to structure datasets, automate reporting workflows and translate business questions into clear analytics.

title: Cloud Solutions Consultant
description:
Description:
We are seeking a Cloud Solutions Consultant to support digital transformation projects for clients migrating to cloud-based environments. You will help design scalable architectures, improve cloud workflows and guide teams through implementation.

Responsibilities:
Architect cloud environments (AWS/Azure/GCP) based on client needs
Lead migration projects and infrastructure setup
Optimize performance, security and cost management
Create technical documentation and implementation guides
Collaborate with IT teams and provide technical expertise

Requirements:

Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure or GCP)
Understanding of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines
Strong troubleshooting and solution design skills
Ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Consulting experience preferred

title: AI / Machine Learning Consultant
description:
We are searching for an AI & Machine Learning Consultant to work on high-impact technology projects. You will design models, evaluate performance, and assist companies in adopting intelligent automation and predictive analytics.

Responsibilities:

Build & train ML models for classification, forecasting or automation
Evaluate datasets, create pipelines and optimize algorithms
Present technical results and insights to clients
Support AI adoption strategy and integration into products
Write documentation and deliver technical project reports

Requirements:

Proficiency in Python (TensorFlow/PyTorch preferred)
Understanding of data engineering and model deployment
Research-minded problem solver with a practical approach
Ability to work on remote project teams
Prior consulting or freelance experience is an advantage

title: Business Intelligence Consultant
